sqlMap.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from board where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select num,name,subject,email,hitCount,to_char(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created from board where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%' order by num desc) data)
where rnum>=#start# and rnum<=#end#
